nodes.text: Blue buttermilk biscuits were a type of biscuit made using butter-milk made from blue milk. The biscuits were available with gravy for 3.7 as a breakfast side dish at Dex's Diner, an eatery located on the planet Coruscant. Dexter Jettster, the Besalisk owner and chef at Dex's, described the biscuits served in his diner as "moisture farm fresh" on the establishment's menu. The biscuits were available at some point prior to the destruction of Dex's Diner during the first two years of the Galactic Empire's reign.
Blue buttermilk biscuits were first mentioned in "Dining at Dex's," an article written by Gregory Walker and published exclusively in the Hyperspace section of StarWars.com in 2009.
